gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 123, Trail Blazers 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Trail Blazers, 123-111.  Paul George led the way with 27 points, six assists and three steals for the Clippers, while Kawhi Leonard added 23 points, five rebounds and six assists in the victory.  Malcolm Brogdon tallied 20 points and five assists for the Trail Blazers in his debut, while Scoot Henderson added 11 points, three rebounds and four assists in his NBA debut in the losing effort.  The Clippers improve to 1-0 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 0-1.
